reviews.review:
good action, but definitely needs a HD remaster

Ricochet 2 before Half-Life 3

Ricochet is a very underrated game, not so many people are playing it but it's a good thing. When you meet people in this fantastic game it feels wonderful. People that play Ricochet are the nicest players in the entire online gaming community. You chat, say hello, laugh and sometimes even cry. Playing with bots is fun too though. They are skilled and not easy to defeat, so it requires a good reaction and spatial thinking. This game actually makes you grow as a human being, helps you overcome your fears and become a better person in general. The design is also a positive trait. Perhaps you have heard of the cyberpunk. This game uses elements of this genre. Cyberpunk 2077? Bruh, Ricochet did it first. Sometimes I connect to empty servers and just observe the infinte void of the cold cosmos... It makes me feel hella spiritual and philosophical. 

So, in conclusion... If you are a smart person and sagacious gamer you should play this game. At least try. Do not belive in what people say, they are wrong. You can find beauty in simple things. As William Blake once wrote: "To see a World in a Grain of Sand. And a Heaven in a Wild Flower. Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand. And Eternity in an hour".
Imagine a game where the projectiles move around but it's also entirely set on a place not unlike that alien planet from Half-Life.  Ugh.

[h1] Playlist: [h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nbqMIBYJlvk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-kQVnqVwz_A&list=PLga3HGW8MLD0LQZX1U6P666h5czyklwB4 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVqS3tB8OtE

[i]Ricochet[/i] seems like an interesting idea, but any time I have ever attempted to play it, there are no players online.

With the amount of people complaining about nobody being online, you'd think that eventually you'd run into maybe one or two people playing the actual game or waiting for others to join in while they play with bots, but this is never the case. 

The sighting of another player on here is next to none, and I would assume it to be almost impossible to experience this with other human beings unless you and a few of your friends got together and joined or created a lobby, therefore know what you are paying for when you get this title. Do not expect a easily joined multiplayer experience with frequent players: you will have to create your own multiplayer experience with [i]Ricochet[/i].

I feel as though the complete lack of dedicated players speaks to the quality of this release on its own, and frankly, if it was truly of great quality like positive reviews assure you of, I think there would be at least one other living, breathing being in a lobby after multiple attempts at finding one, and with this in mind, it's hard to believe this was a great experience in the first place if it is dead and buried while other games of its time are still kicking.

i CAME

Познакомился с этой модификацией в 2005 году, ещё в компьютерном клубе. Работала она на WON версии Half-Life. Ещё тогда, в столь юном возрасте я понял, что не все игры бывают хорошими... Эта игра по-настоящему меня бесила своим скучным и неинтересным геймплеем, не запоминающими картами и бесполезными бонусами, по типу "тройной выстрел", "быстрый выстрел" и подобными. Тут нельзя кинуть диск так, как тебе хочется, то есть, диск всегда будет лететь прямо и если твой враг находится на платформах выше или ниже тебя, то вам сначала нужно встретиться, прежде чем атаковать. Я не рекомендую покупать эту игру, да и если вы её купите, то поиграть в неё не сможете из-за отсутствия игроков на серверах.

За 10 лет существования этой игры в моей библиотеке, я не смог и часу отыграть в этот "шедевр" от Valve. А говорят, что Valve делает только шедевры... Просто напомните этим фанатикам о существовании такой игры, как Ricochet, за которую ещё и просят деньги. Это я должен просить деньги у Valve за то, что я за 10 лет смог отыграть целых 39 минут в это

I honestly don't know why this game is as dead as it is. It's really nice for a quick match and rewards good movement skills.
It can be hard to get into (mostly because there are no other players most of the time) but when you actually find a match with a few people you can have a lot of fun.

Si buscas videojuegos muertos en tu diccionario aparece Ricochet, dejando de lado el chiste y los memes, puede ser divertido si juegas con amigos como casi cualquier juego de esa época, pero en este caso no creo que entretenga por mas de unas pocas horas, el juego no incluye bots por si solo y si tienes un poco de suerte encontraras a alguien jugando en el online, por mi parte tuve esa suerte y llegue a jugar una partida con 11 jugadores, todo un record para este juego en 2019. Solo lo recomiendo comprar entre amigos y cuando este de oferta.

Este jogo... eu tenho muita pena deste pobre jogo, ele e considerado o pior jogo da valve que é uma coisa que eu discordo não e mesmo CSGO? eu acho este game ótimo até jogabilidade boa, proposta divertida, mais se você não teve seu cérebro derretido por jogar muito LXGO ou e muito novo para saber disso, quanto menos popular um jogo menos players este jogo terá, só que este jogo foi tão mais tão impopular que quando 2 pessoas estão jogando acredite e uma media de players incrível, eu acho que para esse jogo ser mais popular ele deveria ser F2P, por que mano ele custa 10,89 reais, isso parece barato mais e muito caro para um jogo morto! Day-Of-Defeat: Source meu jogo favorito de Deathmatch Multiplayer, custa 20,69 é mesmo ele sendo um jogo incrível não é seu preço adequado deveria ser 9,50 pois não esta morto mais não tem muitos players, bem ricochet não é o pior jogo da valve, não é nem nunca será ele apenas não vale a pena por causa dos players, por que fora isso ele seria um ótimo passa-tempo mais infelizmente não é a nossa realidade Nota do jogo: 3/10. Nota se o jogo não fosse morto 8/10.
